Name: Wolf
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The fewer allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Wolf
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 4.5%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The fewer allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Wolf
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The fewer allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Commd
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The more allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Commd
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 4.5%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The more allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Commd
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The more allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Pen.
Description: Reduces 3% of the target's Extra DMG Reduction when dealing DMG. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Pen.
Description: Reduces 4% of the target's Extra DMG Reduction when dealing DMG. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Pen.
Description: Reduces 5% of the target's Extra DMG Reduction when dealing DMG. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: LtShd
Description: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 20% Lightning DMG. 3s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: LtShd
Description: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 25% Lightning DMG. 2.5s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: LtShd
Description: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 30% Lightning DMG. 2s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Wave
Description: Creates shock waves that repel nearby enemies when getting up from the ground.

Name: Mine
Description: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 15% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Mine
Description: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 20% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Mine
Description: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 25% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Stl
Description: Enter Stealth after 5 seconds. Taking damage will break Stealth and you can't enter Stealth within 3 seconds.

Name: Stl
Description: Enter Stealth after 3 seconds. Taking damage will break Stealth and you can't enter Stealth within 3 seconds.

Name: Stl
Description: Enter Stealth after 1 seconds. Taking damage will break Stealth and you can't enter Stealth within 3 seconds.

Name: Flash
Description: When being far away from the target, teleports to a spot nearby. Has a cooldown of 8-10 seconds. The further the teleport distance is, the shorter the cooldown becomes.

Name: Flash
Description: When being far away from the target, teleports to a spot nearby. Has a cooldown of 7-9 seconds. The further the teleport distance is, the shorter the cooldown becomes.

Name: Flash
Description: When being far away from the target, teleports to a spot nearby. Has a cooldown of 6-8 seconds. The further the teleport distance is, the shorter the cooldown becomes.

Name: Tele
Description: Teleport away when close to the target. Has a cooldown of 8 seconds. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldown are calculated separately.

Name: Tele
Description: Teleport away when close to the target. Has a cooldown of 7 seconds. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Tele
Description: Teleport away when close to the target. Has a cooldown of 6 seconds. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldowns are calculated separately.

Name: Div
Description: Upon death, summons two identical replicas that inherit its 30% ATK and DEF

Name: Div
Description: Upon death, summons two identical replicas that inherit its 60% ATK and DEF

Name: Div
Description: Upon death, summons two identical replicas that inherit its 100% ATK and DEF

Name: BHole
Description: Deploys a black hole with weak power at own position at intervals.

Name: BHole
Description: Deploys a black hole with normal power at own location at intervals.

Name: BHole
Description: Deploys a black hole with strong power in own location at intervals.

Name: Ray
Description: Fires lasers that deal 3% Physical DMG in eight directions at intervals.

Name: Ray
Description: Fires lasers that deal 4% Physical DMG in eight directions at intervals.

Name: Ray
Description: Fires lasers that deal 5% Physical DMG in eight directions at intervals.

Name: Flame
Description: Attacks deal an additional 10% Fire DMG and have a 10% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 10% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Flame
Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Fire DMG and have a 15% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 15% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Flame
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Fire DMG and have a 20% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 20% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Freez
Description: Attacks deal an additional 10% Ice DMG and reduce 15% of targets' Movement Speed. Have a 10% chance to inflict Freeze that lasts 0.3s.

Name: Freez
Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Ice DMG and reduce 20% of targets' Movement Speed. Have a 15% chance to inflict Freeze that lasts 0.5s.

Name: Freez
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Ice DMG and reduce 25% of targets' Movement Speed. Have a 20% chance to inflict Freeze that lasts 0.7s.

Name: Dark
Description: Attacks deal an additional 10% Dark DMG. Have a 10% chance to inflict Stun that lasts 0.5s and deal an additional 10% Dark DMG.

Name: Dark
Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Dark DMG. Have a 15% chance to inflict Stun that lasts 0.7s and deal an additional 15% Dark DMG.

Name: Dark
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Dark DMG. Have a 20% chance to inflict Stun that lasts 0.9s and deal an additional 20% Dark DMG.

Name: TClap
Description: Attacks deal an additional 10% Lightning DMG. Have a 10% chance to inflict Lightning Lure and call down a lightning strike at the target's location every 1.5s. Lasts 1.5s.

Name: TClap
Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Lightning DMG. Have a 15% chance to inflict Lightning Lure and call down a lightning strike at the target's location every 1.5s. Lasts 3s.

Name: TClap
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Lightning DMG. Have a 20% chance to inflict Lightning Lure and call down a lightning strike at the target's location every 1.5s. Lasts 4.5s.

Name: Icle
Description: Shoots an icicle that tracks the enemy, dealing 5% Ice DMG on contact. The farther from the target, the faster the icicle moves.

Name: Icle
Description: Shoots an icicle that tracks the enemy, dealing 10% Ice DMG on contact. The farther from the target, the faster the icicle moves.

Name: Icle
Description: Shoots an icicle that tracks the enemy, dealing 15% Ice DMG on contact. The farther from the target, the faster the icicle moves.

Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 4.5%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The fewer allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Wolf
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The fewer allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Commd
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 5%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The more allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Commd
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 10%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The more allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Commd
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15%. Can be stacked up to 10 times. The more allies around, the more times it can be stacked.

Name: Pen.
Description: Reduces 3% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Pen.
Description: Reduces 4% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: Pen.
Description: Reduces 5% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 10s.

Name: LtShd
Description: When attacked, has a 10% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 20% Lightning DMG. 5s cooldown.

Name: LtShd
Description: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 25% Lightning DMG. 2.5s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: LtShd
Description: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 30% Lightning DMG. 2s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Wave
Description: Creates shock waves that repel nearby enemies when getting up from the ground. 18s cooldown.

Name: Wave
Description: Creates shock waves that repel nearby enemies when getting up from the ground. 14s cooldown.

Name: Wave
Description: Creates shock waves that repel nearby enemies when getting up from the ground. 10s cooldown.

Description: When attacking, leaves a bomb that deals 15% Physical DMG on the target.

Name: Stl
Description: Enter Stealth after 3s. Taking DMG will break Stealth.

Description: Enter Stealth after 3 seconds. Taking damage will break Stealth and you can't enter Stealth within 3 seconds.

Name: Stl
Description: Enter Stealth after 1 seconds. Taking damage will break Stealth and you can't enter Stealth within 3 seconds.

Name: Flash
Description: When being far away from the target, teleports near it. 10s cooldown.

Name: Flash
Description: When being far away from the target, teleports near it. 7-9s cooldown. The farther away from the target, the shorter the cooldown becomes

Name: Flash
Description: When being far away from the target, teleports near it. 6-8s cooldown. The farther away from the target, the shorter the cooldown becomes

Name: Tele
Description: Teleport away when close to the target. Has a cooldown of 8 seconds. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldown are calculated separately.

Name: Tele

Name: Tele

Description: Upon death, summons two identical replicas that inherit its 60% ATK and DEF

Description: Upon death, summons two identical replicas that inherit its 100% ATK and DEF

Description: Deploys a black hole at own position in every 12s.

Description: Deploys a strong black hole at own position in every 8s.

Description: Fires lasers that deal 4% Physical DMG in eight directions at intervals.

Description: Fires lasers that deal 5% Physical DMG in eight directions at intervals.

Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Fire DMG and have a 15% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 15% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Fire DMG and have a 20% of chance to inflict Burn, dealing 20% of Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Description: Attacks deal an additional 15% Dark DMG. Have a 15% chance to inflict Stun that lasts 0.7s and deal an additional 15% Dark DMG.

Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Dark DMG. Have a 20% chance to inflict Stun that lasts 0.9s and deal an additional 20% Dark DMG.

Description: When the enemy dies, all allies within 20m of it will receive 25% more DMG. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Burning Fire
Description: When the enemy dies, all allies within 20m of it restore 20% HP.

Name: Protection
Description: Grants the enemy and its nearby allies a shield equal to 10% of its current HP every 10s. Shields granted this way cannot be stacked.

Name: Sacrifice

Description: Increases all damage bonuses by 20% for each dead ally.

Description: Increases all damage bonuses by 20% for each dead ally.

Name: Frost Shield

Name: Flame Shield

Name: Shadow Shield
Description: When HP drops by more than 20%, creates a shield equal to 10% of max HP for 5s. When it disappears, it will explode and deal damage within 8m.

Name: Projection
Description: Generates 1 projection behind that will attack along with the character.

Name: Shadow Shield
Description: A shield generated by Shadow Shield. When it disappears, it will deal explosion DMG.

Name: Stand Firm
Description: Enemies become more powerful with a complete formation.

Name: Break Formation
Description: The formation is broken. Enemies receive 20% more DMG.

Name: Dread
Description: The formation is broken. Enemies have lost their morale.

Name: Afterimage
Description: Avoid attacking the afterimages of the Golden Age.

Name: Splitting
Description: After 5 growths, split and create 1 new Splinter at the cost of all stacks. The Splinter will inherit the Parent's growth ability but can't split.

Name: Growth

Description: Raise the Health limit.

Description: Raise the Health limit.

Name: Co-existence
Description: Split from the Parent. Will die when the Parent dies.

Name: Captain

Name: Silver Wave Scoot
Description: Intermittently enhance Strength and Speed and ignore collisions while moving.

Name: Hermit Red
Description: Summon a projection to connect to a player. If the player does not leave for a period of time, then the player will reveal their weaknesses and lose Speed and Resistance.

Name: Golden Star
Description: Becomes immune to the time effects. Intermittently summons a projection to stop the time within a small area around the caster.

Name: Autonomous Diamond
Description: When a teammate dies, restores 50% HP for the teammate. It can't restore HP for the caster.

Name: Silver Experience
Description: Intermittently summons Self-Destruction Bugs around the caster.

Name: Electromagnetization
Description: Inflict Lightning DMG equal to 20% ATK upon dealing damage

Name: Super Lightning Field
Description: Generate vertical and diagonal lightnings around the target every 8s in that order

Name: Dominator
Description: Immune to Matrix and limiting effects of Signature Moves

Name: Overload
Description: Receives "Energy Loss" upon receiving Lightning DMG. This effect does not stack

Name: Iron Shield
Description: Have a shield equal to 10% max HP upon deployment. The shield will not refresh

Description: Loses 20 Dodge and 20 Energy within 4s

Description: DMG Immunity of this unit increases by 30%

Description: All DMG increases by 10%

Name: Undying

Description: HP is significantly increased

Name: Light

Name: Darkness
Description: Receives the power of darkness to hide in the shadows and gains [Bleed] in dark environment.

Name: Repel Demons
Description: Reduce Energy each time you deal damage.

Name: Bleed
Description: Inflicts an amount of Bleed each time you deal damage. When Bleed reaches 100%, deals true damage equal to 70% of the target's max HP. Bleed can only be reduced by standing in light.

Name: Power of Nature
Description: Restores 1% HP per second. Summons a Fairy every 8s that rotates around you. When you have 3, releases all Fairies onto the target to deal damage and reduce max HP.

Name: Alert
Description: DMG increases over time when there are enemies in the same area. The DMG bonus resets when there are no enemies in the same area.

Name: Security Captain
Description: Summons reinforcements periodically while the Security Captain is present.

Name: Reserve
Description: Gains an effect when the Signal Light changes color while waiting.

Name: DMG+
Description: DMG is greatly increased under the red light.

Name: DMG Reduction+
Description: DMG Reduction is greatly increased under the yellow light.

Name: Energize
Description: Gains a DMG bonus based on HP percentage.

Name: Charge
Description: Cast skills immediately after moving to boost the damage based on Movement Speed.

Name: Scorching Hot
Description: The unit will be Burnt for 5s upon receiving damage. Increasing Strength Points can tear apart the wound. Every 5 Strength Points can make the target take 10% more Burnt DMG and have the Burnt effect for 0.5s longer.

Name: Burn
Description: Burns the unit's wound and makes the unit take Burnt DMG once every second.

Name: Recovery
Description: The wound is recovering. Immune to the Burn effect for 8s.

Name: Arctic
Description: The recovery speed of the unit's Movement Speed and Dodge Gauge will decrease over time. Spend Physique Points to resist the coldness. Every 5 Physique Points can reduce the effect by 5%.

Name: Hypothermia
Description: The recovery speed of the unit's Movement Speed and Dodge Gauge has been reduced.

Name: Lightning Bug
Description: The unit can receive damage from Lightning Bugs. Use Energy Defense Points to resist their power. Every 5 Energy Defense Points can prolong the Lightning Bug generation interval by 0.5s and transfer 5% of the incoming explosion damage to the enemy.

Name: Supercharged
Description: The unit will take additional damage from Lightning Bugs.

Name: Corrosion
Description: Upon receiving damage, the unit will expose its weakness and take more damage until the end of the battle. Use the Focus Points to suppress the generation of the weaknesses. Every 5 Focus Points can reduce the Vulnerable effect by 2%. Every 10 Focus Points can further increase the target's Vulnerable effect by 2%.

Name: Fragility
Description: The unit takes Extra DMG based on the Weakness Exposure Level until the end of the battle.

Name: Flexibility
Description: If there are more than 3 ally units within 10m around the caster, then the caster will deal more damage based on the number of extra allies. Otherwise, the caster gains DMG Reduction. Stacks up to 3 times. Use Strength Points to suppress the enemy, with each 10 Strength Points reducing the DMG Bonus and DMG Reduction Bonus of each stack by 5% and 1% respectively.

Name: Advance Together
Description: Allies: {0}, DMG Increase: {1}% ({2}% - {3}%)

Name: Retreat Together
Description: Allies: {0}, DMG Reduction Increase: {1}% ({2}% - {3}%)

Name: Wave
Description: The unit is in an unstable status and deals fluctuating damage. Use the Physique Points to deal with the unstable attacks. Every 5 Physique Points can reduce the enemy's maximum damage dealt by 5%. Every 10 Physique Points can reduce the enemy's minimum damage dealt by 5%.

Name: Charge
Description: Charges once every 20s and gains 1 stack of [Charge] effect. Enters the [Overload] form and stops charging after 3 charges. Use the Energy Defense Points to better understand the Charge effect. Every 10 Energy Defense Points can add 5s to the charging interval and reduce the Final DMG Bonus by 5% and Signature Energy by 1.

Name: Charge
Description: Increases DMG by {0}% ({1}% - {2}%) and Movement Speed by {3}%.

Name: Overload
Description: Every time the caster deals damage, it will reduce the target's Signature Energy by {0}%  ({1}%  - {2}%).

Name: Interference
Description: The unit can interfere with the enemy's enemy-tracking system, reducing the incoming damage dealt by the enemy in the distance and having a chance to dodge the attack. Use the Focus Points to be more concentrated and resist the Interference effect. Every 10 Focus Points can add 1m to the range of the Interference effect and reduce the DMG Reduction by 5% and dodge effect by 3%.

Name: Stealth
Description: The unit receives {0} less damage from you and has a {1} chance to dodge your attacks.

Name: Energy Gathering
Description: Elemental Resistance increases by 20%. Has a 25% chance to also deal Fire, Ice, Lightning, or Dark DMG equal to 25% of the caster's ATK when dealing DMG. Can be triggered once every second.

Name: Tenacity
Description: All Resistances increase by 20%. All Resistances decrease by 2% for 12s every time when the character is attacked. Stacks up to 20 times. Upon dealing DMG, has a 30% chance to inflict Extra Physical, Fire, Ice, Lightning, or Dark DMG equal to 30% of the caster's ATK. Can be triggered once every 0.5s.

Name: DMG Increase
Description: All DMG increases by 15%.

Description: The unit deals 30% more damage.

Name: High Temperature
Description: Upon dealing damage, the unit will also deal Fire DMG equal to 30% ATK.

Description: The unit's Shield has gone up.

Name: Vigor

Name: Corrosion
Description: Every time when the unit deals damage, it will make all the Corrupted deal more damage and move faster for 10s.

Name: Holy Light

Description: Causes all present characters to lose 10% HP upon death.

Name: Implosion
Description: Immune to damage dealt by the character. Loses HP every second.

Name: Self-Hatred
Description: Deals damage to all nearby targets over time. Closer targets take more damage.

Name: Fission
Description: Summons 2 Clones upon death that lose HP over time.

Name: Phantom
Description: Summons 1 Clone every 30s that rapidly loses HP over time.

Name: Stagnancy
Description: Becomes petrified for 5s after taking damage from the character. Immune to damage dealt by characters while petrified.

Name: Vulnerable
Description: DMG taken increases.

Name: Hesitation
Description: Reduces the Movement Speed and Dodge of attackers when taking damage.

Name: Hesitation
Description: Restores 5% Finisher Gauge per second after not taking damage for 8s.

Name: Immune Red
Description: Immune to DMG from Red Orb Skills.

Name: Immune Yellow
Description: Immune to DMG from Yellow Orb Skills.

Name: Immune Blue
Description: Immune to DMG from Blue Orb Skills.

Name: Immune Basic
Description: Immune to Basic Attack DMG.

Name: Signature Immunity
Description: Immune to Signature DMG.

Name: Vulnerable
Description: DMG taken increases.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 15%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 30%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 45%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 60%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 75%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 90%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 105%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 120%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 135%.

Name: Silence
Description: 3-Ping Basic Skill Attacks can impact Hamlet's internal program and increase all DMG taken based on this feature by 150%.

Name: Scorch
Description: Attacks will also inflict Burn, dealing Fire DMG equal to 10% ATK every second to the target for 10s.

Name: Frost
Description: Attacks will also deal Ice DMG equal to 30% ATK and reduce the target's speed by 30% for 10s.

Name: Lightning Strike
Description: Attacks will also deal Lightning DMG equal to 30% ATK and reduce the target's ATK by 30% for 10s.

Name: Dark Corruption
Description: Attacks will also deal Dark DMG equal to 50% ATK and reduce the target's healing by 30% for 10s.

Name: Armorbreak
Description: Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 50%.

Name: Armorbreak
Description: Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 100%.

Name: DMG Immunity
Description: Extra DMG Reduction increases by 50%.

Name: Basic Attack Vulnerability
Description: Receives more Basic Attack DMG.

Name: Red Resistance
Description: Extra DMG Reduction against Red Orb skills increases.

Name: Blue Resistance
Description: Extra DMG Reduction against Blue Orb skills increases.

Name: Yellow Resistance
Description: Extra DMG Reduction against Yellow Orb skills increases.

Name: Fire
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Physical DMG and have a 20% chance to inflict Burn, dealing 20% Physical DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Assault
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20%

Name: Growth
Description: Raise the Health limit.

Name: Rigidity
Description: The enemy gains Super Armor but receives 300 more damage when taking damage.

Name: Melee Protection
Description: Takes less damage from melee characters but more from ranged ones.

Name: Ranged Protection
Description: Takes less damage from ranged characters but more from melee ones.

Name: Force Field
Description: The enemy deals less damage when receiving less than 7000 DMG and greatly more when receiving more than 7000 DMG.

Name: Splitting
Description: When the enemy's HP drops below 50%, they will split into two units with 50% HP.

Name: Support
Description: Summons an identical unit at intervals. The interval increases over time.

Name: Protection
Description: The enemy gains a shield of 30% Max HP.

Name: Freeze
Description: Attacks deal an additional 20% Physical DMG and slow down the Target's movement speed by 25%, have 20% of chance to Freeze for 0.7s

Name: Decree
Description: Friendly unit that cannot attack.

Name: Neutrality
Description: Friendly unit that cannot attack.

Name: Evil
Description: Enemy Unit

Name: Chaotic Evil
Description: Enemy unit with increased HP and DMG.

Name: Growth
Description: When there is a teammate, the enemy gains a 5% DMG Bonus and loses 10% Resistances every 10s.

Name: Curse
Description: Curses your character after death, making the character deal 1000% more DMG but die 10s later.

Name: Revenge
Description: Gains ATK and attack frequency but reduces Resistances to 0 after a teammate dies

Name: Self-Destruction Bug
Description: Periodically summons 1 Self-Destruction Bug to attack the enemy.

Name: Rigid Body
Description: Takes 1 DMG only from incoming attacks. This effect is removed after taking DMG 3 times, and is resumed 8s later.

Name: Stealth
Description: You can switch to invisibility 5s later if you are visible now. And when you are hit, you will be visible again for 3s

Name: Immovable
Description: Immune to hit and control effects.

Name: Blessing
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus of allies nearby by 20%.

Name: Flash
Description: When you are far away from the target, transfers you close to the target, CD for 6-8s. The farther the transfer distance, the shorter the CD

Name: Dominator
Description: Immune to the limiting effects Matrix and Signature

Name: Ice Vulnerability
Description: Ice Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Protection
Description: Grants the enemy and its nearby allies a shield equal to 10% of its current HP every 10s. Shields granted this way cannot be stacked.

Name: Commander
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 6%. Stacks up to 10 times. The more the allies nearby, the higher the stacks

Name: Closed Loop
Description: A damage to the remote enemy, increases Extra DMG Reduction by 30%

Name: Berserk
Description: Increases ATK frequency by 33%. 20% chance to deal 33% extra Physical DMG when damaging a target.

Name: Burning Fire
Description: When this enemy is taken down, all their allies within 5m of it will restore 20% HP.

Name: Grudge
Description: Enemy's attacks will reduce your team's ATK by 10%. The reduced ATK will be refunded when the enemy is taken down.

Name: Physical Vulnerability
Description: Physical Resistance decreases by 60%.

Name: Commander
Description: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 10%. Stacks up to 10 times. The more the allies nearby, the higher the stacks

Name: Diffusion
Description: Enemy attacks will remove 1 Signal Orb. When the enemy is taken down, it returns all Signal Orbs.

Name: Barrier
Description: Receives a permanent shield equal to 10% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. Removes the shield after taking a certain amount of damage. It will reactivate in 15s.

Name: Recovery
Description: Recovers 1% of max HP per second.

Name: Revenge
Description: When this enemy is taken down, all their allies within 5m of it will gain 25% damage dealt and 5% Movement Speed. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Berserk
Description: Increases ATK frequency by 33%. Has a 40% chance to deal 33% extra Physical DMG when damaging a target.

Name: Teleport
Description: Teleport away when close to the target. Has a cooldown of 8s. Has a 30% chance to trigger the effect when taking DMG. Cooldown are calculated separately.

Name: Barrier
Description: Receives a permanent shield equal to 30% of current HP. Becomes immune to attacks while the shield is active. Removes the shield after taking a certain amount of damage. It will reactivate in 15s.

Name: Radiation
Description: Continuously deals 3% Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Recovery
Description: Recovers 3% of max HP per second.

Name: Revenge
Description: When this enemy is taken down, all their allies within 5m of it will gain 50% damage dealt and 10% Movement Speed. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Burning Fire
Description: When this enemy is taken down, all their allies within 5m of it restore 30% HP.

Name: Physical Vulnerability
Description: Physical Resistance decreases by 60%.

Name: Agility
Description: Increases 20% - 35% movement speed. The farther away from the target, the faster the movement speed

Name: Shield
Description: Gains a shield with capacity equal to 10% of current HP every 10s. The shield lasts 10s.

Name: Invasion
Description: When dealing DMG, also deals 1% Physical DMG to the target every second for 3s.

Name: Fire Vulnerability
Description: Fire Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Lightning Vulnerability
Description: Lightning Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Nyctophobia
Description: Dark Resistance decreases by 30%.

Name: Invasion
Description: When dealing DMG, also deals 5% Physical DMG to the target every second for 3s.

Name: Lightning Shield
Description: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 10% Lightning DMG. 3s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Deterioration
Description: DMG dealt also reduces target's healing received by 30% for 3s.

Name: Abyss Feast
Description: Elemental and Physical Resistances decrease by 15%.

Name: Abyss Feast
Description: Elemental and Physical Resistances decrease by 40%.

Name: Revival
Description: Upon death, absorb Mechanoid Moon Eater's HP to revive.
